data.title: Stratovarius Forum
data.text:
Stratovarius

Forum

stratovarious the great band from finland, i like this band cause the music very interesting with special elemen of classical heavy metal and with power vocalist. The first album that i heard is vision, all the song in vision album very interesting, second album i heard is destiny same like vision but i like the anthem of the world.....i hope stratovarios successfully in ure curior..ok see yeah..

>>By romie (Thursday, 21 Nov 2002 06:32)

stratovarious its a great heavy metal band,its my favorita band(of course)the music of this band is ver very special for me well i dont know english,but my the force be with you

STRATOVARIOUS RULZ

>>By paradise (Sunday, 24 Nov 2002 02:45)

Sratovarious has intesting power metal as well as Heavy Metal tracks my favorite songs being SOS, Phenix, and Speed of light. definietly check these and other great songs out from this group if your a fan of Rock

>>By Mx (Monday, 9 Dec 2002 23:06)

A new wind in the metal has come...a wind of nightmare...a wind of darkness...a wind of change...Hail Stratovarius

>>By max (Tuesday, 17 Dec 2002 13:14)

klçlk

>>By kllçk (Thursday, 13 Feb 2003 22:36)

Come on people. Stratovarius isn't rock, it's Power Metal. notice capitol P and M? their great! i have all their albums and i can't wait for them to release a new album. ;)

>>By warchild (Friday, 14 Mar 2003 08:01)

my sister moy spaei taneyra! einai 15 xronon kai e inai malakismeni (Tuesday, 18 Mar 2003 18:44)

Stratovarius is a great band i like very much, and i wish to go some day to a concert, Stratovarius visited Chile, but i couldn t see them.

that is my only dream, their music is very special.

I dont know english very well but ..........

STRATOVARIUS YOU HAVE TO COME TO CHILE AGAIN!!!!!!

>>By kailyn (Tuesday, 18 Mar 2003 21:52)

stratovarius you are the best power metal group! keep doing this great job.!!!!!!!! timo i like you so much.........

>>By elli (Wednesday, 19 Mar 2003 11:18)

Stratovarius, one of the best melodic heavy metal bands ever from Finland, surprises me very much! I hope you guys release very soon that DVD you said you'd do. I can't wait to watch it!!! Well, I hope you guys come back to Brazil (my country) again, cos' I'll do anything to watch you live! Keep the flames, you guys, hold on to your dream and never give up in your life, ok????

Alan Sampaio

>>By Sampaio (Monday, 14 Apr 2003 01:39)

I love you so much and your music is very divine...!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

>>By tiia'88 (Monday, 5 May 2003 17:27)

para mi es la banda porno mas chida de este planeta ya que desde que naci la escucho ya que mis tios son fanaticos de la banda y ellos fueron mi influencia.

>>By marcos rolando pozos roman (Saturday, 14 Jun 2003 23:38)

STRATOVARIUS is my favorite band and i like aloe of songs for it and once i sent the vocalset an email and he answered me and i was the happiest guy in the world and i have a band and we play power metal and the first power metal song i've heare was for stratoavrius and it is (( hunting high and low )) and then i start listning to their other songs and my favorite song for them is destiny and i hope that they listinto my band's songs andn like them and like the band ;)

>>By ~~^*(( RHYTHYM of GLORY ))*^~~ (Monday, 30 Jun 2003 15:16)

Stratovarius what i want to say u the real melodic power metal band, i love u music so much...keep good work and God blessed u all..see u.

>>By trunks (Wednesday, 9 Jul 2003 04:20)

excuse me but i don´t think stratovarios as a melodic heavy metal band for me they are a POwer Metal band the best for me

>>By dark queen (Wednesday, 16 Jul 2003 00:48)

Yo creo que Stratovarius es la única banda que me ha hecho sentir realmente el poder del Heavy Metal, es fantastica no hay nadie igual!!!

>>By Victor Aguilar (Monday, 21 Jul 2003 22:13)

The best group!!!!!!!!! Kasha (Czech Republic)

K.a.s.h.a.@gentlemail.com

>>By Kasha (Friday, 25 Jul 2003 22:04)

Why did Timo Kotipelto leave ? He is one of the greatest heavy metal singers in the ffuckin' world.

>>By _sleepwalker (Saturday, 22 May 2004 22:32)

The discussion board is currently closed.
